channel.title: Side Project Poker Bot
channel.description:
I was really excited about this at one point,
[img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/2238/screen3jk.jpg[/img]
Sends info to 127.0.0.1:1337 to integrate with java for AI (which I never got around to finishing)
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/1766/screen4zy.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/7054/turnflop.jpg[/img]
Too time consuming to do. And I really don't know how to play poker. I had Win API detours however I removed all of them, besides IsDebuggerPresent
Mostly code caves / 4 function hooks and SSLRead
Anyways, bypassed punkbuster for BF2 and now troll people there
[img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/2751/bf2a.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@nade wrote:

What’s your problem man? How much of a bad life you got? Why are you even attacking me? How insecure can you be? You want to win the nerd award to make up the lack of reputation or something

[quote=“abraham2119, post:7, topic:365470”]you use irc to interface with java for ai…so yes, you are conveying all the game events on the irc server in a formatted syntax, that is how you are communicating with the java ai bot…thus, this is how you are communicating among these two different processes…HENCE INTERPROCESS COMMUNICATION YOU FUCKING IDIOT

and way to evade all the other valid points you dumbfuck[/quote]

void nRecv( )
{	
	printf("[BOT] Binding Socket 127.0.0.1\n\r");

	if ( !initWinsock( ) )
	{
		printf("Fucking sockets man, how do they work?");
	} else {
		printf("[BOT] Socket Made\n\r");
	}
	
	char szBuffer[256];
    int nBytesRecv; 

	while ( 1 )
	{
		ZeroMemory( szBuffer, 256 );

		fgets( szBuffer, 255, stdin );

		nBytesRecv = recv(Socket, szBuffer, 255, 0 );
		
		if (nBytesRecv == SOCKET_ERROR) 
		{
			closesocket(Socket);
			printf("Error: Fucking sockets man.");
			system("pause");
		}

		printf("Incoming Message: %s \r\n", szBuffer);
	}
}

ITT: nigger can’t read. It doesn’t use IRC for IPC. On that note, I refuse any other garbage you wrote since you can’t retain information.

item.title: Side Project Poker Bot
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

Oh really? I couldn’t fucking hook it right? ExtTextOutW with DrawTextW along with GetWindowOrgEx/GetViewportOrgEx accomplishes everything I need you fucking retard. And I recall you private messaging me asking for advice on how to extract information from the client. Regardless, I’m way further along than you are on it; mine already supports multiple tables and uses an MAS design for the AI, completely dynamic and modular - all written in C for optimal performance. I’ve implemented support for more than one casino, simply by implementing a DLL for each.

As for the next matter, that is a (fucking poor) attempt at interprocess communication; you are interfacing Java with C/++ via IRC and you seriously cannot see how flawed the design is? The injected DLL receives a game event, sends a respective packet to the IRC server, the Java client receives the packet, parses it, performs all the AI (which, if correctly done, will probably take a relatively noticeable amount of time - especially in Java), the client communicates with the input manager (I don’t know if you are stupid enough to also do this via IRC) and the input manager executes the respective action. Taking into consideration the ping time, the AI processing time while playing on a table (or essentially multiple) with a time limit, with players (and anti-cheating software) noticing the constant delay in decision making throughout each round, I’d say that’s a fucking solid design…

Read full topic

item.title: Side Project Poker Bot
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

abraham2119:

wow you fucking fag, way to steal an idea and rofl at the fact that you’re planning on performing the logic via java and doing ipc via irc…learn design

You are that retard that couldn’t even hook it right. Really what did ExtTextOutW accomplish for you? A whole lot of nothing? I’ve seen your screen shot. I remember laughing at you with everyone in IRC. I asked who you were and everyone said you are an idiot. You have great reputation here.

doing ipc via irc...learn design
Sends info to 127.0.0.1:1337 to integrate with java for AI (which I never got around to finishing)

I guess you are too fucking inbred to read. Doesn’t use irc for inter process communication. I just made the java app, connect to IRC for the fun of it. I thought it was a neat idea.

The fact that you say I stole your idea, is absolutely shocking to me. In your opinion, you are the first person to ever try (and I use the word try very loosely here) make a bot for Doyle’s room? I’ve seen 1 screen shot of a hook 2+ months ago. And I’m wondering how much you have accomplished so far.
